title: @Riot Sound Team champion spotlight music
body: Since you finally uploaded Butcher's Bridge Music, I was wondering if you could do the same for the music used in champion spotlights ever since Tahm Kenches one. Its the music played during skill explanation and teamfight scenario showcase.

replies.body: Hey beany. I'm TreblMuffin, the mixer on the sound team. We're in the process of getting this lil track out to live on the big ol interwebz with its friends. The Music Team is just trying to figure out the best way to make it work because the track is actually multiple pieces of music. Thanks for digging the music!

OMG finally an answer!
So where will you post it? On Soundcloud? 
I hope it won't sound different from the one we hear in the videos.

Can't speak to where it will be released or what it will sound like directly, best to let our kick ass composers do that. I'm actually really excited that you guys enjoy that music. I remember right around the time of Tahm Kench the champ spotlight team had been considering ditching those tracks and going with something different.

Edit: unnecessary "but"
Do you know approximately when is it going to be released?
Thanks! this one is I feel more "special" since it doesn't feature prominently, and many people might miss out on this gem.
